title: Wiktionary:Frequency lists/Spanish/Mixed 730K - Wiktionary, the free dictionary
cleaned_text: public download courtesy Akademie der Wissenschaften / InfAI, 2023. [[1]](#cite_note-1) See [suggestions for how to use these lists](/wiki/Wiktionary:Frequency_lists#Suggestions_for_how_to_use_these_lists). Most importantly, please remember inclusion on this list does not in itself satisfy the [Criteria for Inclusion](/wiki/Wiktionary:CFI). Collocations may or may not warrant their own individual entries, and not necessarily in the exact form they appear here. If you see a word in this list which is clearly out of place (wrong language, punctuation, superfluous capitalisation), you are welcome to remove entries for words, please leave valid bluelinks in place as these pages may be copied for use with other language projects in Dictionaries at the Leipzig Corpora Collection: 100 to 200 Languages.", in Proceedings of the 8th International
